frameDefinitions: A Speaker declares that they will no longer be involved with the Content.
A Cause or Agent causes a Patient to undergo a change of phase.
AForgoer decides not to partake in something ordinary that is otherwise Desirable.
A Protagonist has made a Commitment but does not honor it, thereby doing harm to an Affected_party.
A Self_mover leaves an initial Source location.
An Entity has a Temperature characterized by the target.
frameExamples: That will only be possible if and when the IRA <t>renounces</t> armed struggle.
My buddy Tom's girlfriend <t>backed out</t> of going to the show with me.
The pan is already too <t>hot</t> to touch.
listRoleDefinitions: The <fen>Speaker</fen> is the person who communicates their cessation of association with the <fen>Content</fen>.
The idea that the <fen>Speaker</fen> no longer associates with, whether it be an activity, a propostion, or a group.
<fen>Medium</fen> is the physical entity or channel used by the <fen>Speaker</fen> to transmit the statement of renunciation.
The time when the statement is made.
The role specifies the place where the statement takes place.
The <fen>Agent</fen> causes the <fen>Patient</fen> to change phase.
The <fen>Patient</fen> undergoes a change of phase brought about by the <fen>Agent</fen>.
The <fen>Cause</fen> is the non-<fen>Agent</fen> which brings about the change in the <fen>Patient</fen>.
This role identifies the Time at which the change of phase occurs.
This role identifies the place where change of phase occurs.
The <fen>Forgoer</fen> decides not to partake in the desirable activity or event.
<fen>Desirable</fen> identifies the event or activity in which is the <fen>Forgoer</fen> does not partake.
This role identifies the <fen>Time</fen> at which the the forgoing occurs.
This role identifies the <fen>Place</fen> where the forgoing occurs.
The <fen>Protagonist</fen> is the person who has committed themselves to do something and later does not follow through on it.
The individual or group to whom the <fen>Protagonist</fen> had made the <fen>Commitment</fen> and who is negatively affected by the <fen>Protagonist</fen>'s not honoring the <fen>Commitment</fen>.
An expression of the commitment that the <fen>Protagonist</fen> has taken on earlier and which they fail to follow through on.
The time period during which the <fen>Protagonist</fen> fails to honor their commitment.
The location in which the <fen>Protagonist</fen>  fails to honor the commitment they made.
This is the entity which moves under its own power.

Any expression which implies a definite starting-point of motion expresses the frame element <fen>Source</fen>. In prepositional phrases, the prepositional object expresses the starting point of motion. In particles, the starting point of motion is understood from context.
The time at which the motion takes place.
The <fen>Place</fen> is where the motion (which is specified by a <fen>Source</fen>, <fen>Path</fen> or <fen>Goal</fen>) is located.
The <fen>Entity</fen> for which the temperature <fen>Attribute</fen> is under consideration.
The feature of an <fen>Entity</fen> which is under discussion.
A quantity or other characterization of the <fen>Entity</fen>'s state with respect to the temperature <fen>Attribute</fen>.
A modifier expressing  the deviation of the <fen>Temperature</fen> from the norm.
The <fen>Time</fen> during which the <fen>Entity</fen> is in the state of having  a particular <fen>Degree</fen> for the temperature <fen>Attribute</fen>.
listRoleExamples: Bonnie Charlie then renounced <fex>his aspirations to the throne</fex>.
Castro renounced all involvement with the group <fex>over the radio</fex>.
The human rights situation is infinitely better now than under the Taliban, but <fex>the Bush administration</fex> has reneged on its pledge of a new Marshall Plan.
Two people backed out <fex>on me</fex> a few days earlier.
It appears that Schwarzenegger will renege <fex>on an agreement he made with teachers</fex>.
When a host city backed out <fex>at the last minute</fex> and Russellville, Ark., landed the opportunity to host the Babe Ruth 16-Year-Old World Series.

But his efforts came to nought when 18 of the 19 accused were bailed out as most
witnesses backed out <fex>in court</fex>.
The skillet had a temperature <fex>of 230 F</fex>

passageCandidateSpans.text: Paris: Éditions Mille et une nuits

sourceCandidateSpans.text: the space of a few generations
Public Enemies: Dueling Writers Take on the World
